EcoFOCI


Oceanographic/Atmospheric Data Analysis Resources


Oceanographic Data Resources




National Buoy Data Center


NOAA OI SST V2 High Resolution Dataset


PlanetOS
 replaced marineexplorer.org and is trying to be a data discovery portal for earth sciences.




Meteorological Data Resources




NARR
 data (as netcdf)


NCEPV2
 data (as netcdf)


And many additional gridded datasets are available through ESRL








 The NARR and NCEP data are initially developed by NCEP and are grib files.  As of June 2016, ESRL migrated all data into netCDF4-classic data (which is essentially netcdf3)

mkdocs.org

Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.
